title: FT Cobb Bat Off Old Mill - Raw
author: BKaufmann14

posts.post_title: FT Cobb Bat Off Old Mill - Raw
posts.post_content:
Have a nice Old Mill Ty Cobb Bat off for trade. It is raw but would likely grade in the 3 range. Value of $6.5k. Ideally looking for tough tough off backs, and HOF off backs… especially Hindus. Carolina Brights, Lenox, Uzit, Drum, Red Hindu, etc.

For pics text me 219-218-8414 or email me [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url]
Let’s bump this. Some good offers but still looking for a nice trade ideally or a partial one.
